answers.answer: Hi,How are you? Increased frequency of urine could be due to excess intake of fluid, during pregnancy, UTI, STD, diabetes, tumors in the bladder etc.As your history suggests that you have been experiencing this problem since your previous delivery due to use of catheter, I would advise you to get a check of the badder. Sometimes an overactive bladder can cause frequent urge to pass urine and discomfort on retention.Also get a STD panel done along with urine analysis.Consult your urologist with reports.All the best.

question: I have had a cathider used twice in my life and im 28yrs old. I had my son when i was 25 and the epidural caused my bladder to not work. I had to wear a cathider for 2 wks. I now and since then notice i have to pee alot more like every 30min to an hour and if i do not urinate during the night i am in horrible pain in the moring.Does this sound like i need to see a specialist. It seems to be getting noticibly worse.
title: bladder retention?
